name: Poweroids
overview: 1995 saw the release of an Asteroids variant, a Shooter game called Poweroids on the Amiga systems, created and published by Matthias Bock for free as a Public Domain. Do you think there's nothing special about a game where you have to destroy asteroids? Well, you are right. These were Matthias' thoughts back in 1995 and so Poweroids was born... Have fun!
